formalpara.title: Summary
formalpara.para: You can copy a virtual disk from one storage domain to another. The copied disk can be attached to virtual machines.

step.para: Select the virtual disks to copy.
Click the Copy button to open the Copy Disk(s) window.
Optionally, enter an alias in the Alias text field.
Use the Target drop-down menus to select the storage domain to which the virtual disk will be copied.

formalpara.title: Result
formalpara.para: The virtual disks are copied to the target storage domain, and have a status of Locked while being copied.
